test/fixtures/type-error/notExhaustiveMatch.lys
    1│ type color {
    2│   Red
    3│   Green
    4│   Blue
    5│ }
    6│ 
    7│ 
    8│ fun test(x: color): color =
    9│   match x {
     │   ^^^^^ Match is not exhaustive, not covered types: Blue
   10│     // there MUST be an error here ^^^^
   11│ 
   12│ 
   13│     case is Red -> Red
   14│     case is Green -> Green
   15│   }
   16│ 
   17│ fun test1(x: color): color =
   18│   match x {
